newsitem.title: GREECE: Greek Natl Stats body takes on board new official.
newsitem.headline: Greek Natl Stats body takes on board new official.

text.p: Greece's National Statistics Service (NSS) new secretary Nicos Karavitis was sworn in today and assumed his duties, the national economy ministry said in a statement.
Karavitis, 38, studied economics at the Athens University and holds a masters' degree and a Ph.D from the University of Leicester, England.
He has been a member of the economic research and analysis unit of the council of economic advisors at the national economy ministry since 1991, it said.
He was elected lecturer of the public administration department at Panteion University in 1993.

Karavitis is a former member of the European Union council of economic policy and is now representing Greece at the monetary committee of the EU, it said. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
